Title: In case if withdraw has failed, then processWithdrawFailure will decrease exchange rate of GMXVault shares
Content: # In case if withdraw has failed, then processWithdrawFailure will decrease exchange rate of GMXVault shares ### Severity Medium Risk ### Relevant GitHub Links https://github.com/Cyfrin/2023-10-SteadeFi/blob/main/contracts/strategy/gmx/GMXWithdraw.sol#L197 https://github.com/Cyfrin/2023-10-SteadeFi/blob/main/contracts/strategy/gmx/GMXWithdraw.sol#L263-L267 ## Summary In case if user has executed withdrawal and it was not accepted by Steadefi, then `processWithdrawFailure` will then put withdrawn amount back to GMX and will loose on slippage, however user will still have same shares amount. ## Vulnerability Details When user withdraws, then he provides shares amount, and the appropriate [`lpAmt` is calculated](https://github.com/Cyfrin/2023-10-SteadeFi/blob/main/contracts/strategy/gmx/GMXWithdraw.sol#L70-L72) to be withdrawn from GMX. Then in case if such withdrawal will fail, for example because [user is not happy with amount that was received after withdrawal](https://github.com/Cyfrin/2023-10-SteadeFi/blob/main/contracts/strategy/gmx/GMXChecks.sol#L224-L227), then call will revert, which means that system will go [to Withdraw_Failed state](https://github.com/Cyfrin/2023-10-SteadeFi/blob/main/contracts/strategy/gmx/GMXWithdraw.sol#L207-L209). Note, that in this case, user's shares will not be burnt, as it's done only, when [withdraw has succeeded](https://github.com/Cyfrin/2023-10-SteadeFi/blob/main/contracts/strategy/gmx/GMXWithdraw.sol#L197). So what we have now. We have executed withdrawal with some slippage, so our total assets has decreased a bit. What will be done next. We will call `processWithdrawFailure` function, which will deposit back all received funds and we will again face [some slippage](https://github.com/Cyfrin/2023-10-SteadeFi/blob/main/contracts/strategy/gmx/GMXWithdraw.sol#L263-L267). But user will steal have same shares amount. As result we have lost funds on 2 actions with slippage, which means that all stakers of GMXVault had a loss. ## Impact Stakers of the pool have a loss in case of failed withdrawals. ## Tools Used VsCode ## Recommendations Maybe it can be better, to burn shares even when deposit has failed and then recalculate shares amount after liquidaity is added back to GMX.
